{"step_by_step_thinking": "First, I will look for each of the options in the documents. Misoprostol is mentioned in Document 1 as being used for prevention and treatment of uterine atony. Carboprost is mentioned in Document 13 as being used in postpartum hemorrhage caused by uterine atony. Methyl ergometrine is mentioned in Document 17 as being used in the management of postpartum hemorrhage. However, Mifepristone is not mentioned in any of the documents as being used in the treatment of postpartum hemorrhage.", "answer_choice": "B. Mifepristone"}
